step1.title: üëã You are almost there! Set your native language
step1.description: You have successfully installed Read Frog extension. With just a few steps, you are ready to start your language learning journey.

step2.title: üìå Pin Read Frog extension icon
step2.description: The Read Frog extension icon provides the main functionality and configuration of the extension. Please refer to the example image and pin the extension to continue.

hint.pinned: You can continue to the next step now.
hint.unpinned: Hint: Please pin the extension to continue the next step!

hint.translated: You can continue to the next step now.
hint.notTranslated: Hint: You can continue after translation.

step4.description: You have already mastered the basic functions of the companion frog! If you want to activate more advanced features, please use the tutorial below for configuration.
